comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called School group portrait, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 26602074@N06
comment._content: Burnt Yards provisional school was established in June, 1870, and operated intermittently as a public school until March, 1946; from March, 1904 to May, 1925 it was known as Belubula School. Ref: Govt Schools in NSW 1848-1983.
